## filetree() function

Create a filetree component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function filetree(options: FiletreeBuilderOptions): ComponentBuilder<FiletreeModel>;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

options


</td><td>

</td><td>

Configuration options for the filetree


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;[FiletreeModel](./filetree.filetreemodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A `ComponentBuilder` ready to use with `AppBuilder.component`

## Remarks

Creates a `ComponentBuilder` wrapping the `@boba-cli/filetree` package. The filetree provides keyboard navigation through directory listings with scrolling viewport support.

## Example 1

Basic usage:

```typescript
import { filetree } from '@boba-cli/dsl'
import { filesystem, path } from '@boba-cli/machine'

const app = createApp()
  .component('files', filetree({
    filesystem,
    path,
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.files)
  .build()
```

## Example 2

With custom styling and directory:

```typescript
import { filetree } from '@boba-cli/dsl'
import { filesystem, path } from '@boba-cli/machine'
import { Style } from '@boba-cli/chapstick'

const app = createApp()
  .component('files', filetree({
    filesystem,
    path,
    currentDirectory: '/home/user/projects',
    showHidden: true,
    height: 20,
    width: 80,
    styles: {
      selectedItem: new Style().foreground('#50fa7b').bold(),
      normalItem: new Style().foreground('#f8f8f2'),
    },
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => vstack(
    text('File Browser').bold(),
    components.files
  ))
  .build()
```
